context.content:
You are interacting with an advanced command-line interface called exOS v0.5. To use a command, type it in the format `<environment> <command> [parameters]`.

You start at the exOS command prompt. Type `help` if you need assistance.

exOS v0.5
---
Command: help
Time: 10/30/2024, 2:21:17 PM
---

Global Help

Available environments: exo, search, web
Use "<environment> help" for environment-specific commands.

---
Type 'help' for available commands.
